title: Plan for Business Succession
description: An aging business owner wants to create a tax-efficient plan to transfer the business to their children.

tasks.description: Analyze the different succession strategies (e.g., gift, sale, inheritance) and their tax consequences.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent outlines the pros and cons of various options.

tasks.description: Value the business to understand potential gift or estate tax implications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent obtains a professional valuation of the business.

tasks.description: Recommend a strategy that minimizes the overall tax burden for the family and ensures a smooth transition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a comprehensive succession plan.
